skill.name: landing-page-design
skill.description: Create high-converting, visually distinctive landing pages. Use when building marketing pages, product launches, SaaS homepages, or any single-page conversion-focused website. Guides section-by-section composition with anti-AI-slop principles.
skill.summary: Create high-converting, visually distinctive landing pages. Use when building marketing pages, produ...
skill.author: 2389-research

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown design guidance. No scripts, executable code, network calls, or file system access. The static findings are all false positives: hex color codes were misidentified as weak cryptographic algorithms, markdown code examples with backticks were misidentified as shell execution, and design resource URLs were misidentified as reconnaissance. Original static analysis confirmed safe with risk_level: safe.

content.value_statement: AI-generated landing pages often look generic with purple gradients and recycled patterns. This skill enforces unique visual identity through Vibe Discovery, creating pages that stand out and convert better than templates.
actual_capabilities: Guide Vibe Discovery process to create unique visual identity for each project
Build section-by-section landing pages with hero, features, social proof, pricing, and CTA
Apply anti-convergence rules to avoid generic AI-generated patterns
Implement animations using entrance, continuous, and interactive animation vocabulary
Enforce distinctive typography and color choices derived from real-world references
limitations: Does not generate code or write files directly. Provides design guidance for AI execution.
Does not integrate with design tools like Figma or Sketch.
Does not perform A/B testing or conversion analytics.
User must implement the actual HTML/CSS/JS based on design guidance.

use_cases.title: Launch landing pages
use_cases.description: Create distinctive launch pages that differentiate your startup from generic competitors

use_cases.title: Campaign pages
use_cases.description: Build high-converting pages for product launches, seasonal promotions, and feature announcements

use_cases.title: Design documentation
use_cases.description: Generate design specifications and patterns for handoff to development teams

prompt_templates.title: Basic landing page
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a landing page for my new [PRODUCT TYPE]. The brand feels like [REAL-WORLD PLACE/OBJECT]. The emotion should be [EMOTION].

prompt_templates.title: With collision concept
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a landing page that collides [INFLUENCE 1] with [INFLUENCE 2]. The vibe should be unexpected but cohesive.

prompt_templates.title: Section addition
prompt_templates.prompt: Add a [SECTION TYPE] section to my existing landing page. Match the color palette [PALETTE NAME] and typography [FONT] from the hero.

prompt_templates.title: Animation request
prompt_templates.prompt: Add [ANIMATION TYPE] animation to the [ELEMENT]. The effect should feel [EMOTION] and use [PRIMARY COLOR] as accent.

output_examples.input: Create a landing page for a productivity app. It should feel like a quiet library at night.
output: Palette: Warm leather brown, aged paper cream, deep walnut, gold foil accent
Signature Animation: Elements fade in like pages turning slowly

output_examples.input: Design a landing page for a fashion brand. Collision of Japanese train station and haute couture.
output: Reference: Japanese train station at rush hour
Colors: Platform Edge (black, concrete white, fluorescent white, JR line red)
Signature Element: Strong horizontal bands like train schedules

best_practices: Complete Vibe Discovery before any code to ensure unique visual identity for each project.
Spend fifty percent of effort on the hero section as it determines first impressions and social media previews.
Use Iconify Solar or Phosphor icons instead of overused Lucide icons for visual distinction.
anti_patterns: Reusing hex codes, fonts, or design patterns from previous projects.
Defaulting to Inter, Roboto, or other generic fonts found in most AI-generated pages.
Using purple gradients or the Stripe color palette which signal AI-generated content.

faq.question: What tools does this skill work with?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It provides design guidance that the AI can execute using available coding tools.

faq.question: How long does a landing page take?
faq.answer: A complete landing page typically requires multiple iterations. Focus on the hero first, then add sections systematically.

faq.question: Can I export designs to Figma?
faq.answer: This skill provides specifications and patterns. You would implement designs in code or manually recreate them in Figma.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: This skill only processes design requirements you provide. No data is stored or transmitted outside your session.

faq.question: Why are my designs looking generic?
faq.answer: Generic designs come from memorized patterns. The Vibe Discovery process forces unique choices by deriving from real-world references.

faq.question: How is this different from templates?
faq.answer: Templates produce identical-looking pages. This skill generates unique visual identity for every project through creative collision and fresh references.
